title: 🚨 Report n8n workflow errors to Slack
author: Mutasem
readme:
## Use case

Error workflows are an important part of running workflows in production.

![Screenshot 20240228 at 20.38.12.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2024_02_28_at_20_38_12_8e61c8e897.png)

## How to setup

  1. Add Slack creds
  2. Add this error workflow to other workflows ([docs](https://docs.n8n.io/flow-logic/error-handling/#create-and-set-an-error-workflow))

## 使用场景

在生产环境中运行工作流时，错误处理流程是至关重要的组成部分。

![Screenshot 20240228 at 20.38.12.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Screenshot_2024_02_28_at_20_38_12_8e61c8e897.png)

## 配置步骤

1. 添加Slack凭据  
2. 将此错误处理流程关联至其他工作流（[详见文档](https://docs.n8n.io/flow-logic/error-handling/#create-and-set-an-error-workflow)）
